hero.title: The Ultimate Discord Bot
hero.subtitle: Powerful moderation, fun commands, and endless customization for your server.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage and enhance your Discord server

moderation.title: Moderation
moderation.description: Powerful tools to keep your server safe with auto-moderation, warnings, and more.

fun.title: Fun Commands
fun.description: Games, jokes, memes, and interactive commands to keep your community engaged.

leveling.title: Leveling System
leveling.description: Reward active members with points, levels, and custom ranks.

extensions.title: Custom Extensions
extensions.description: Create or install custom commands and features from our marketplace.

music.title: Music
music.description: High-quality music playback with DJ controls and audio filters.

ai.title: AI Chat
ai.description: Intelligent conversations powered by multiple AI providers.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Add {{botName}} to your server in seconds.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes! All core features are completely free. Premium tiers unlock extras like Music and AI chat.
faq.q2: How do I set up the bot?
faq.a2: Click 'Add to Server', select your server, and you're done! Use the dashboard to customize.
faq.a3: Extensions are custom commands you can create or install from the community gallery.

servers.title: Select a Server
servers.noServers: You don't have any servers to manage.

membership.title: Premium Membership
membership.subtitle: Unlock powerful features for your server

404.title: Page Not Found
404.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

500.title: Server Error
500.message: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.

403.title: Access Denied
403.message: You don't have permission to access this page.
